text: he eemaan vaalo! unake samaan na ho jao, jo kaafir ho gaye tatha apane bhaeeyon se -jab yaatra mein hon athava yudhd mein- kaha ki yadi ve hamaare paas hote, to na marate aur na maare jaate, taaki allaah unake dilon mein ise santaap bana de aur allaah hee jeevit karata tatha maut deta hai aur allaah jo tum kar rahe ho, use dekh raha hai
